ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Why is the constructor ARCWriter(AtomicInteger, PrintStream, File, boolean, String, List) not visible.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... See issue #1495253 on our SourceForge.  We had a problem in which ARC file numbers were being re-used.  It s actually one serialNumber per pool, so two

> Hi Paul.
> Binary compatibility is not an issue, here, but
> we have a lot of test-code using this constructor, where we only  
> generate one arc-file.
> As an aside, what is the point of a serialnumber for each ARCWriter?
See issue #1495253 on our SourceForge.  We had a problem in which ARC  
file numbers were being re-used.  It's actually one serialNumber per  
pool, so two different pools in two different jobs will always  
produce incremental numbers.  For your test code it should be safe to  
just pass a new AtomicInteger.

-Paul
